page.title: 11OLDEST HOUSE IN BENTWORTH
page.content:
FARMING LOCAL HISTORY The Brookings have lived in Bentworth 7 years.The house was built in 1327 as the farm.It has got conections with the church in France.There is a disadvantage which is no village shop. In the family there are a husband,5 children and wife.She likes the house. It is very dusty & hard to keep.She is a housewife.They own the farm which is 320 acres.The house is medieval. There are 2 coats of arms.There is a chapel attached to the house.The farm is arable and pasture.They have got 300 breeding ewes.She has 7 animals.
by Becca & Andrew.
